title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3025/94 of 13 December 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79 on the rules for granting aid to skimmed-milk processed into compound feedingstuffs and skimmed-milk powder intended for feed for calves
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 3025/94 of 13 December 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79 on the rules for granting aid to skimmed milk processed into compound feedingstuffs and skimmed-milk powder intended for feed for calves
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 4 (1a) of Regulation (EEC) No 1725/79, 'between 1 February 1993 and 31 December 1994' is replaced by 'between 1 February 1993 and 30 June 1995'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 298, 19. 11. 1994, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 199, 7. 8. 1979, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 183, 19. 7. 1994, p. 14.
